ValidationRule.description: Required Final OPRO Certification Type for proposal statuses
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
and(or( ISPICKVAL( Proposal_Status__c , "Audit Support"), ISPICKVAL( Proposal_Status__c , "Cost Update"), ISPICKVAL(Proposal_Status__c, "Preparing Certification"), ISPICKVAL(Proposal_Status__c, "Submitted to Contracts"), ISPICKVAL(Proposal_Status__c, "Sweep/Cert"), ISPICKVAL(Proposal_Status__c, "Completed/Closed") , ISPICKVAL(Proposal_Status__c, "Negotiation Support") ),
ISBLANK(TEXT(Final_OPRO_Certification_Type__c)), $Profile.Name !='Services Interfaces API Profile', $Profile.Name !=$Label.API_data_Load_Profile, $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select a value in Final OPRO Certification Type
